attributes.action: Make North Carolina A Country Within The United Kingdom
attributes.additional_details: The People of North Carolina sincerely petition the Parliament of the United Kingdom under these terms BEFORE the United States of America has an opportunity to declare an active hot war against The United Kingdom, Canada, Australia, New Zealand, or the European Union.
attributes.background: Make North Carolina A Country Within The United Kingdom With The 1st and 2nd Amendments of the Current US Constitution Remaining In Tacked For Current Residents within the Landmass of North Carolina.

rejection.details: Making North Carolina a country within the United Kingdom would be a matter for North Carolina to decide, and not something the UK Government or Parliament could unilaterally do.
